channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-22514] HiveProtoLoggingHook might consume lots of memory
item.description: HiveProtoLoggingHook uses a ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor to submit writer tasks and to periodically handle rollover. The builtin ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor uses a unbounded queue which cannot be replaced from the outside. If log events are generated at a very fast rate this queue can grow large.
item.summary: HiveProtoLoggingHook might consume lots of memory

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
